_comment: Created by rreed on 25/05/2017 13:38:26 using v2.7
title: What is the trend for asthma, diabetes and epilepsy unplanned emergency admissions for the under 19s?
analysis_commentary:
The rate of emergency admissions for asthma, diabetes and epilepsy in children and young people has declined from 345.9 per 100,000 in 2003/04 to 311.7 per 100,000 in 2015/16; a decrease of 9.9%.

Updated April 2017.
